component.name: Fastboot-Assistant
component.summary: Program to facilitate the installation of custom ROMs and GSIs on Android devices

description.p: The Fastboot Assistant facilitates the installation of Custom-ROMs and GSIs on Android devices. It offers a user-friendly GTK4 interface and integrates tools such as adb, fastboot and heimdall.
Check the ADB/fastboot connection and whether the bootloader of the device is unlocked. Retrieve device information.
Boot into fastboot mode, reboot out of fastboot mode, reboot into download mode, reboot into recovery mode.
Lock/unlock the bootloader, delete user data, set active slot (a/b devices only). Change/remove/create the size of the boot/vendor/system partition.
Back up the complete system (only for users with root access to the system) or use Open Android Backup (thanks to @mrrfv who developed this tool).
Flash many different images, everything from system images to preloader images.
